SMC_GEOINFO (STRUCT)
SMC_GEOINFO (STRUCT)
Â¶
TYPE SMC_GEOINFO : STRUCT
This data type is designed to store a path object, i.e. a segment of the programmed path, for example a line, arc or spline segment.
In addition to the geometry of these objects, further information can be stored as for example the velocity at the beginning/end of the path or as labels.
Note
As from V3.5 SP2 of the programming system,
iSourceLine_No
stores the line number of the CNC word and the sentence number is stored in
diSentenceNo
.
In former versions, in particular CODESYS V2.3, the sentence number has been stored in
iSourceLine_No
.
The parameters
dP1
--
dP18
are used for specific use cases.
Depending on
iMoveType
, these parameters contain different information:
LIN, LINPOS
:
Complete information stored in
piStartPos
and
piDestPos
CLW, CCLW
:
The coordinates are stored in the coordinate system
(vX,
vY,
vN)
.
dP1
: X-coordinate of circle center
dP2
: Y-coordinate of circle center
dP3
: Circle radius
dP4
: Z-coordinate of circle
SPLINE
:
dP1-dP8
: Spline parameter
dP9-dP18
: Additional spline parameter
ELLCLW, ELLCCLW
:
dP1
: X-coordinate of circle center
dP2
: Y-coordinate of circle center
dP3
: X-component of the main axis unit vector
dP4
: Y-component of the main axis unit vector
dP5
: Length of the main axis
dP6
: Length of the subaxis
dP7
: Angle between main axis and X axis (in rad)
dP8
: Ratio P6/P5
MCOMMAND
:
for M-commands (
iMoveType
=
120
) the values of
dP1
, â¦
dP8
are returned  by
SMC_GetMParameters
.
dT1
and
dT2
are the start and end parameters for circle/spline.
LIN, LINPOS
:
Complete information stored in
piStartPos
and
piDestPos
CLW, ELLCLW
:
dT1
: Start angle in degree, oriented mathematically (0=east, 90=north, 180=west, 270=south)
dT2
: Apex angle of circle in degree (e.g. 90=quarter of circle, 180 = semicircle)
CCLW, ELLCCLW
:
dT1
: Start angle in degree oriented mathematically (0=east, 90=north, 180=west, 270=south)
dT2
: Negative apex angle of circle in degree (e.g. -90=quarter of circle, -180 = semicircle)
SPLINE
:
Start and end value of parameter t, Spline, 0 and 1 by default.
InOut:
Name
Type
Initial
Comment
iObjNo
DINT
Arbitrary object number (irrelevant for current path
description). Itâs a 1-based, consecutive ID.
iSourceLine_No
DINT
Stores the 0-based line number inside the CNC source file
diSentenceNo
DINT
Stores the G-code sentence number (value of the N-word)
iMoveType
SMC_MOVTYP
Value defining the geometrical type of the object.
SMC_MOVTYP
(ENUM)
piStartPos
SMC_POSINFO
The start position of the object.
piDestPos
SMC_POSINFO
The end position of the object

LREAL
0

LREAL
0

LREAL
0

0

LREAL
0

LREAL
0
dP18
LREAL
0
vX
SMC_Vector3D
STRUCT(dX := 1, dY := 0, dZ := 0)
X-axis of the local coordinate system, expressed in world
coordinates.
vY
SMC_Vector3D
STRUCT(dX := 0, dY := 1, dZ := 0)
Y-axis of the local coordinate system, expressed in world
coordinates.
vN
SMC_Vector3D
STRUCT(dX := 0, dY := 0, dZ := 1)
Z-axis of the local coordinate system, expressed in world
coordinates.
dT1
LREAL
0
Start parameter for circle/spline
dT2
LREAL
1
Apex angle/end parameter for circle/spline
dToolRadius
LREAL
0
The tool radius. Necessary for path processing with
SMC_ToolRadiusCorr
.
dSmoothRadius
LREAL
0
The smooth radius. Necessary for path processing with
SMC_RoundPath
and
SMC_SmoothPath
.
dVel
LREAL
0
Target velocity to be reached (in path units/sec)
dVelEnd
LREAL
0
Prescribed velocity at end of object (path units/sec)
dVelEndStored
LREAL
No longer used, kept for compatibility.
dVelEndSafe
LREAL
0
Computed for the quadratic velocity profile: maximum <=
dVelEnd
that allows to reach
dVelEndSafe
of the next element.
May be -1 if the next element has identical values for acceleration, deceleration, and velocity.
dAccel
LREAL
100
Maximum allowable acceleration (in path units/secÂ²)
dDecel
LREAL
100
Maximum allowable deceleration (in path units/secÂ²)
dLength
LREAL
0
Length of object in path units
wInternMark2
WORD
0
Intern marks for tool correction, rounding, etc.
byInternMark
BYTE
0
Start and end of path preprocessing actions:
Bit 0 set: Stop tool radius correction after this object
Bit 1 set: Start tool radius correction to the left of this object
Bit 2 set: Start tool radius correction to the right of this object
Bit 3 set: Stop path rounding/smoothing after this object
Bit 4 set: Start path smoothing at this object
Bit 5 set: Start path rounding at this object
Bit 6 set: Stop avoiding loops after this object
Bit 7 set: Start avoiding loops at this object
dwFeatureFlags
DWORD
If
TRUE
, the object is a 3D-object
b3DMode
BOOL
FALSE
Stores feature bits set by G38/G39
dHelpPos
ARRAY
[0..MAX_IPOSWITCHES] OF
LREAL
Relative position of auxiliary switches (0: object start, 1:
object end, similar to G-code: O)
iHelpID
ARRAY
[0..MAX_IPOSWITCHES] OF
INT
ID (G-code: H) of auxiliary switches.
If the current object is of type
MCOMMAND
,
iHelpID[0]
will contain the number of the M-option.
adVelAddAx
ARRAY [0..7] OF LREAL
If value
<>
0
, then it specifies the velocity values for following use:
[0]
: all G0 commands
[1]
: Z-axis
[2]
: P-axis
[3]
: Q-axis
[4]
: U-axis/A-axis
[5]
: V-axis/B-axis
[6]
: W-axis/C-axis
[1]
-
[6]
: These are maximum values used of
SMC_ExtendedVelocityChecks
.
adAccAddAx
ARRAY [0..7] OF LREAL
adDecAddAx
ARRAY [0..7] OF LREAL
aAdditionalParams
ARRAY
[0..(SMC_MAX_ADDITIONAL_PARAMS
- 1)] OF LREAL
Additional parameters set by G38 I/J/K
adToolLength
ARRAY [0..2] OF LREAL
Parameters for tool length compensation (set by G43 I/J/K)
dPrecision
LREAL
The precision of the G-Code, see input dPrecision of
SMC_NCInterpreter.
OriConv
SMC_ORI_CONVENTION
The orientation convention in use for this object.
DCS
SMC_PosInfo
The decoder coordinate system, expressed in MCS.
Meaning of dA/dB/dC depends on OriConv
smoothPathActive
BOOL
Set by
SMC_SmoothPath
based on byInternMark
roundPathActive
BOOL
Set by
SMC_RoundPath
based on byInternMark
toolRadiusCorrLeftActive
BOOL
Set by
SMC_ToolRadiusCorr
based on byInternMark
toolRadiusCorrRightActive
BOOL
Set by
SMC_ToolRadiusCorr
based on byInternMark
avoidLoopActive
BOOL
Set by
SMC_AvoidLoop
based on byInternMark
smoothAddAxesActive
BOOL
Set by
SMC_SmoothAddAxes
based on wInternMark2
cvParams
SMC_CheckVelParams
The parameters of
SMC_CheckVelocities
.
probeNumber
UDINT
The probe number (G31, PROBE word in G-Code), 0 if not a probe
movement.

rows.Name: iObjNo
rows.Comment:
Arbitrary object number (irrelevant for current path
description). Itâs a 1-based, consecutive ID.

rows.Name: iSourceLine_No
rows.Comment: Stores the 0-based line number inside the CNC source file

rows.Name: diSentenceNo
rows.Comment: Stores the G-code sentence number (value of the N-word)

rows.Name: iMoveType
rows.Comment: Value defining the geometrical type of the object.SMC_MOVTYP(ENUM)

rows.Name: piStartPos
rows.Comment: The start position of the object.

rows.Name: piDestPos
rows.Comment: The end position of the object

rows.Name: vX
rows.Comment:
X-axis of the local coordinate system, expressed in world
coordinates.

rows.Name: vY
rows.Comment:
Y-axis of the local coordinate system, expressed in world
coordinates.

rows.Name: vN
rows.Comment:
Z-axis of the local coordinate system, expressed in world
coordinates.

rows.Name: dT1
rows.Comment: Start parameter for circle/spline

rows.Name: dT2
rows.Comment: Apex angle/end parameter for circle/spline

rows.Name: dToolRadius
rows.Comment: The tool radius. Necessary for path processing withSMC_ToolRadiusCorr.

rows.Name: dSmoothRadius
rows.Comment: The smooth radius. Necessary for path processing withSMC_RoundPathandSMC_SmoothPath.

rows.Name: dVel
rows.Comment: Target velocity to be reached (in path units/sec)

rows.Name: dVelEnd
rows.Comment: Prescribed velocity at end of object (path units/sec)

rows.Name: dVelEndStored
rows.Comment: No longer used, kept for compatibility.

rows.Name: dVelEndSafe
rows.Comment:
Computed for the quadratic velocity profile: maximum <=dVelEndthat allows to reachdVelEndSafeof the next element.
May be -1 if the next element has identical values for acceleration, deceleration, and velocity.

rows.Name: dAccel
rows.Comment: Maximum allowable acceleration (in path units/secÂ²)

rows.Name: dDecel
rows.Comment: Maximum allowable deceleration (in path units/secÂ²)

rows.Name: dLength
rows.Comment: Length of object in path units

rows.Name: wInternMark2
rows.Comment: Intern marks for tool correction, rounding, etc.

rows.Name: byInternMark
rows.Comment: Start and end of path preprocessing actions:Bit 0 set: Stop tool radius correction after this objectBit 1 set: Start tool radius correction to the left of this objectBit 2 set: Start tool radius correction to the right of this objectBit 3 set: Stop path rounding/smoothing after this objectBit 4 set: Start path smoothing at this objectBit 5 set: Start path rounding at this objectBit 6 set: Stop avoiding loops after this objectBit 7 set: Start avoiding loops at this object

rows.Name: dwFeatureFlags
rows.Comment: IfTRUE, the object is a 3D-object

rows.Name: b3DMode
rows.Comment: Stores feature bits set by G38/G39

rows.Name: dHelpPos
rows.Comment:
Relative position of auxiliary switches (0: object start, 1:
object end, similar to G-code: O)

rows.Name: iHelpID
rows.Comment:
ID (G-code: H) of auxiliary switches.
If the current object is of typeMCOMMAND,iHelpID[0]will contain the number of the M-option.

rows.Name: adVelAddAx
rows.Comment: If value<>0, then it specifies the velocity values for following use:[0]: all G0 commands[1]: Z-axis[2]: P-axis[3]: Q-axis[4]: U-axis/A-axis[5]: V-axis/B-axis[6]: W-axis/C-axis[1]-[6]: These are maximum values used ofSMC_ExtendedVelocityChecks.

rows.Name: aAdditionalParams
rows.Comment: Additional parameters set by G38 I/J/K

rows.Name: adToolLength
rows.Comment: Parameters for tool length compensation (set by G43 I/J/K)

rows.Name: dPrecision
rows.Comment:
The precision of the G-Code, see input dPrecision of
SMC_NCInterpreter.

rows.Name: OriConv
rows.Comment: The orientation convention in use for this object.

rows.Name: DCS
rows.Comment:
The decoder coordinate system, expressed in MCS.
Meaning of dA/dB/dC depends on OriConv

rows.Name: smoothPathActive
rows.Comment: Set bySMC_SmoothPathbased on byInternMark

rows.Name: roundPathActive
rows.Comment: Set bySMC_RoundPathbased on byInternMark

rows.Name: toolRadiusCorrLeftActive
rows.Comment: Set bySMC_ToolRadiusCorrbased on byInternMark

rows.Name: toolRadiusCorrRightActive
rows.Comment: Set bySMC_ToolRadiusCorrbased on byInternMark

rows.Name: avoidLoopActive
rows.Comment: Set bySMC_AvoidLoopbased on byInternMark

rows.Name: smoothAddAxesActive
rows.Comment: Set bySMC_SmoothAddAxesbased on wInternMark2

rows.Name: cvParams
rows.Comment: The parameters ofSMC_CheckVelocities.

rows.Name: probeNumber
rows.Comment:
The probe number (G31, PROBE word in G-Code), 0 if not a probe
movement.
